attributes.action: Opt out of being one of the big four that pays for the Eurovision Song Contest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not see why, the UK, is one of the 'Big Four Countries' that pays lots of money to the Eurovision Song Contest. As there are now more countries in the contest, each country should have to pay an equal share! I, as a tax payer, and no doubt there are others, do not believe we as a country should be paying a large amount of money into this contest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
